Name: Author
Description: The information about the author.

Name: Authors
Description: The optional authors of the {{NAME}}.

Name: Assess Performance
Description: Simple performance assement based on the following attributes of the types (No unit conversion is applied for now, so make sure that all your types have the values with the same unit.): floor area, effective floor area, residents, workspaces, construction cost, maintenance expenses, income, transmission heat loss, ventilation heat loss, cooling energy demand, technical equipment energy demand,construction global warming potential, heating load, cooling load, ventilation air flow volume

Name: Base
Description: The shared base props for {{NAME}} models.

Name: Model BLock Definition
Description: Contains a collection of Model Block Definitions

Name: Block Instance
Description: The position of a Block Definition , with its own position, rotation, and scale.

Name: Block Instances
Description: The positions of the model block definitions , with their own position, rotation, and scale.

Name: Cache
Description: The cache to store remote kits and representations.

Name: Center
Description: The optional center of the piece in the diagram. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a center.

Name: Collider
Description: A closed mesh collider for collision checks.

Name: Connected
Description: The connected side of the piece of the connection.

Name: Connecting
Description: The connecting side of the piece of the connection.

Name: Colour
Description: The colour the geometry is displayed with.

Name: Connection
Description: A connection between two pieces in a design.

Name: Connections
Description: The optional connections of a design.

Name: Compatible Families
Description: The optional other compatible families of the port. An empty list means this port is compatible with all other ports.

Name: Created At
Description: The time when the {{NAME}} was created.

Name: Child Name
Description: The names of the children {{NAME}} categories.

Name: Child Factor
Description: The factor of the child qualities, to sum them up. No factor means default.

Name: Description
Description: The optional human-readable description of the {{NAME}}.

Name: Definition
Description: The optional definition [ text | uri ] of the attribute.

Name: Diagram
Description: The diagram of the design.

Name: Directory
Description: The optional directory where to find the kit.

Name: Default
Description: Whether it is the default representation of the type. There can be only one default representation per type.

Name: Default
Description: The optional default representation geometry group.

Name: Direction
Description: The direction of the port. When another piece connects the direction of the other port is flipped and then the pieces are aligned.

Name: Design
Description: A design is a collection of pieces that are connected.

Name: Designs
Description: The optional designs of the kit.

Name: Diagram Point
Description: A 2d-point (xy) of floats in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

Name: Draw Diagram
Description: Draw the diagram of the design.

Name: Empty
Description: Empty all props and children of the {{NAME}}.

Name: Entity
Description: An entity is a collection of properties and children.

Name: Export
Description: Export the oppinionatated type and create/overwrite all representation files.

Name: Family
Description: The optional family of the port. This allows to define explicit compatibility with other ports.

Name: Foreign Key
Description: The foreign primary key of the parent {{PARENT_NAME}} of the {{NAME}} in the database.

Name: Key
Description: An individual key for a {{QUALITY}}.

Name: Flipped
Description: Whether a {{Name}} is flipped

Name: Fixed
Description: Something is fixed, when it has a plane (and a center point)

Name: Geometry
Description: A collection of geometry.

Name: Gap
Description: The optional longitudinal gap (applied after rotation and tilt in port direction) between the connected and the connecting piece.

Name: Globally Unique Identifier
Description: A Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) of the entity.

Name: Group
Description: The geometry group for further custom representations.

Name: Homepage
Description: The optional url of the homepage of the kit.

Name: Icon
Description: The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the {{NAME}}. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB.

Name: Identifier
Description: The local identifier of the {{NAME}} within the {{PARENT_NAME}}.

Name: Identifier
Description: The optional local identifier of the {{NAME}} within the {{PARENT_NAME}}. No id means the default {{NAME}}.

Name: Identifier
Description: The props to identify the {{NAME}} within the parent {{PARENT_NAME}}.

Name: Input
Description: The input for a {{NAME}}.

Name: Image
Description: The optional url to the image of the {{NAME}}. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.

Name: Imperial
Description: Set the unit of the value to the imperial unit system, otherwise it is metric.

Name: Jaccard Index
Description: The similarity of the two sets, written in decimal numbers.

Name: Kit
Description: A kit is a collection of designs that use types.

Name: License
Description: The optional license [ spdx id | url ] of the kit.

Name: Layer Name
Description: The {{NAME}} of the layer where the geometry is.

Name: Log
Description: Outputs a message with a warning info, containing the wrong data and a suggestion for fixing it.

Name: Name
Description: The name of the {{NAME}}.

Name: New Name
Description: The new name for a type.

Name: Module Part Diagonal
Description: Vector specifying single Module Part dimensions in base-plane-aligned XYZ axes. The Module Part Diagonal must match Envelopeâ€™s Slot diagonals.

Name: Mime
Description: The Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type of the content of the resource of the representation.

Name: Monoceros Modules
Description: Contains a collection of monoceros modules.

Name: Object
Description: A geometry object.

Name: Objects
Description: The geometry objects of the design.

Name: Old Name
Description: The existing type {{NAME}}.

Name: Origin
Description: The origin of the plane.

Name: Output
Description: The output for a {{NAME}}.

Name: Paper
Description: An abstract paper geometry with no material thickness (colums are lines, walls are surfaces, â€¦).

Name: Parent
Description: The parent of {{NAME}}.

Name: Path
Description: Contains a collection of file paths to the {{NAME}}.

Name: Parse
Description: Parse the {{NAME}} from an input.

Name: Plural
Description: The plural of the singular of the entity name.

Name: Piece
Description: A piece is a 3d-instance of a type in a design.

Name: Pieces
Description: The optional pieces of the design.

Name: Preview Geometry
Description: semio styled preview of geometry.

Name: Preview Port
Description: semio styled preview of ports.

Name: Primary Key
Description: The {{PROP_NAME}} is the primary key of the {{NAME}} in the database.

Name: Port
Description: A port is a connection point (with a direction) of a type.

Name: Ports
Description: The ports of the type.

Name: Props
Description: The props are all values of an entity without its children.

Name: Plane
Description: A plane is an origin (point) and an orientation (x-axis and y-axis).

Name: Plane
Description: The optional plane of the piece. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a plane.

Name: Point
Description: A 3d-point (xyz) of floating point numbers.

Name: Point
Description: The connection point of the port that is attracted to another connection point.

Name: Preview
Description: The optional url of the preview image of the kit. The url must point to a landscape image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a 2x1 rectangle. The image must be at least 1920x960 pixels and smaller than 15 MB.

Name: Attribute
Description: A attribute is a key value pair with an an optional definition.

Name: Attributes
Description: The optional attributes of the {{NAME}}.

Name: Rise
Description: The optional vertical rise in port direction between the connected and the connecting piece. Set this only when necessary as it is not a symmetric property which means that when the parent piece and child piece are flipped it yields a different result.

Name: Release
Description: The release of the engine that created this database.

Name: Remote
Description: The optional Unique Resource Locator (URL) where to fetch the kit remotely.

Name: Representation
Description: A representation is a link to a resource that describes a type for a certain level of detail and tags.

Name: Rules
Description: A collection of monoceros rules that define how modules can be combined with other modules.

Name: Rotation
Description: The optional horizontal rotation in port direction between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.

Name: Run Component
Description: If true run the component.

Name: Select Connection
Description: Select a connection with the connected id and the connecting id. The connections are symetric, so if the conected is the connecting and vice versa it will still selct them.

Name: Select Design
Description: Select a design with a name, an optional variant and an optional view. If no variant is provided it will select all variants. If you want to select the default variant then use the empty text. If no view is provided it will select all views. If you want to select the default view then use the empty text.

Name: Select Piece
Description: Select a piece with the id.

Name: Select Pieces
Description: Select pieces of a certain type. If no variant is provided it will select all variants. If you want to select the default type then use the empty text.

Name: Select Representation
Description: Select exactly one representation based on mime and tags. The tag matching is based on the highest Jaccard index (|âˆ©|/|âˆª|). If the mime type is not given or does not exist, then all representations are used to search for closest match. If index is equally high the first representation is picked.

Name: Select Root
Description: Select the root of the design.

Name: Set
Description: Contains distinct elements

Name: Scale
Description: The optional scale of the {{OBJECT}}.

Name: Side
Description: A side of a piece in a connection.

Name: Source Design
Description: The source design providing the initial geometry and qualities for interpolation.

Name: Shift
Description: The optional lateral shift (applied after the rotation, the turn and the tilt in the plane) between the connected and the connecting piece.

Name: Shader
Description: Contains a collection of display materials.

Name: Slot
Description: Contains a monoceros slot.

Name: Slots
Description: Contains a collection of monoceros slots.

Name: Show Design
Description: Show a design by flattening it and selecting representations based on mime and tags. Select exactly one representation based on mime and tags. The tag matching is based on the highest Jaccard index (|âˆ©|/|âˆª|). If the mime type is not given or does not exist, then all representations are used to search for closest match. If index is equally high the first representation is picked.

Name: Sort Design
Description:
Sort a design by reordering pieces and connections to appear in order that they are discovered by breadth-first-search and some times flipping connected and connecting if the connected is not the parent of the connecting.
âœ…,Su,Suc,Success,{{NAME}} was successful."

Name: T
Description: The parameter t [0,1[ where the port will be shown on the ring of a piece in the diagram. It starts at 12 o`clock and turns clockwise.

Name: Target Design
Description: The target design providing the final geometry and qualities for interpolation.

Name: Transition Factor
Description: Controls [0,1] how much the result resembles the source vs. the target design. For t=0 the result is the source design, for t=1 the result is the target design.

Name: Tags
Description: The optional tags to group representations. No tags means default.

Name: Tilt
Description: The optional horizontal tilt perpendicular to the port direction (applied after rotation and the turn) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.

Name: Transform
Description: A 4x4 translation and rotation transformation matrix (no scaling or shearing).

Name: Turn
Description: The optional turn perpendicular to the port direction (applied after rotation and the turn) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.  Set this only when necessary as it is not a symmetric property which means that when the parent piece and child piece are flipped it yields a different result.

Name: Type
Description: A type is a reusable element that can be connected with other types over ports.

Name: Type
Description: The type-related information of the side.

Name: Types
Description: The optional types of the kit.

Name: Uri
Description: Optinal Unique Resource Identifier (URI) of the kit. This can be an absolute path to a local kit or a url to a remote kit. If none is provided, it will try to see if the Grasshopper script is executed inside a local kit.

Name: Unique Resource Locator
Description: The Unique Resource Locator (URL) to the resource of the representation.

Name: Url Remote Path
Description: The Unique Resource Locator (Url) to the remote ressource of the representations.

Name: Url Local Path
Description: The Unique Resource Locator (Url) to the local ressource of the representations.

Name: Url Paths
Description: The Unique Resource Locators (Url) to all ressources of the representations.

Name: Unit
Description: The length unit for all distance-related information of the {{PARENT_NAME}}.

Name: Unit
Description: The optional unit of the value of the attribute.

Name: Update
Description: Update the props of the {{NAME}}. Optionally empty the {{NAME}} before.

Name: Variant
Description: The optional variant of the {{NAME}}. No variant means the default variant.

Name: Vector
Description: A 3d-vector (xyz) of floating point numbers.

Name: Version
Description: The optional version of the kit. No version means the latest version.

Name: View
Description: The optional view of the design. No view means the default view.

Name: Validate
Description: Check if the {{NAME}} is valid.

Name: Value
Description: The value of the tag.

Name: Value
Description: The optional value [ text | url ] of the attribute. No value is equivalent to true.

Name: Volume
Description: A volumetric geometry group consisting of only 3d watertight elemets with no internal level of detail.

Name: Write Text
Description: (Over)write the text

Name: X
Description: The x-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

Name: X
Description: The x-coordinate of the point.

Name: X
Description: The optional offset in x direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

Name: XAxis
Description: The x-axis of the plane.

Name: Y
Description: The y-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

Name: Y
Description: The y-coordinate of the point.

Name: Y
Description: The optional offset in y direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

Name: YAxis
Description: The y-axis of the plane.

Name: Z
Description: The z-coordinate of the screen point.

Name: Z
Description: The z-coordinate of the point.

Name: ZAxis
Description: The z-axis of the plane.
